se.fredin.gravitation.utils

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.fredin.gravitation.utils.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the game settings.
    Author:
    Johan Fredin

      Sets whether or not bullets should be reversed.
